title: authme插件怎么修改最大注册人数，，
author: qq952882332
txt_content:
我用了authme插件之后，  老是新玩家进入后 注册显示你已经超过系统限制的最大注册数量。找了一下，说改max。。IP这个数值就能。。 但是我的文件里没有这个数值啊。。。 这是我的authme文件里的config文件 DataSource:   mySQLColumnEmail: email   mySQLColumnId: id   mySQLlastlocWorld: world Email:   RecoveryPasswordLength: 8   mailPort: 465   mailSMTP: smtp.gmail.com   mailAccount: ''   mailPassword: ''   mailSenderName: ''   mailSubject: ''   maxRegPerEmail: 10   recallPlayers: false   delayRecall: 5   mailText: 'Dear ,

This is your new AuthMe password for     the server

:



Do     not forget to change password after login!
/changepassword     newPassword' ExternalBoardOptions:   mySQLOtherUsernameColumns: []   bCryptLog2Round: 10   phpbbTablePrefix: phpbb_   phpbbActivatedGroupId: 10   wordpressTablePrefix: wp_ settings:   restrictions:     displayOtherAccounts: true     ForceSpawnOnTheseWorlds: []     banUnsafedIP: false   registration:     enableEmailRegistrationSystem: false     doubleEmailCheck: false   security:     doubleMD5SaltLength: 8     supportOldPasswordHash: false   sessions:     sessionExpireOnIpChange: false   GameMode:     ForceOnlyAfterLogin: false   forceCommands: [] Security:   captcha:     useCaptcha: false     maxLoginTry: 10     captchaLength: 10   console:     logConsole: false Hooks:   multiverse: true   chestshop: true   notifications: true   bungeecord: false   disableSocialSpy: true   useEssentialsMotd: false Performances:   useMultiThreading: true Purge:   useAutoPurge: false   daysBeforeRemovePlayer: 60   removePlayerDat: false   removeEssentialsFile: false   defaultWorld: world   removeLimitedCreativesInventories: false   removeAntiXRayFile: false Protection:   enableProtection: false   countries:   - US   - GB   enableAntiBot: false   antiBotSensibility: 10   antiBotDuration: 10

replies.author: Cloud_Mo
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Cloud_Mo 于 2014-10-19 22:17 编辑 

你好，很高兴为您解答，楼主的情况可能是登入插件出了问题，楼主下载我的config文件后放入Auheme文件夹内覆盖原有config文件即可解决问题。谢谢，下载地址点我进入下载地址 注：我的config文件内附有修改注册人数的提示。谢谢。望采纳！
